channel.title: People who are familiar with emulous based servers only please
channel.description: Hi im using evoscape base and i really want to edit a lot of the things but its an emulous server and i dont know how to code emulous that well cause the files are arranged diffrently Someone post here if your a decent coder and are familiar with emulous so i could ask you some questions please :D
